description: New updates brings ads in the game. So out of touch it's funny.

It used to be a really cute game that worked great on mobile devices, but it stopped launching. I would normally submit a bug report, and was going to, but a quick recursory glance at the devs issues section on github and their responses.. make you realise quickly that that would be a waste of your time. (They appear to be rude and very short with people, and don't have interest in fixing any bugs or asking about issues, it appears.)

Super easy to play and fun to watch, my high score is 150-something rn :3

Please make more linux mobile games in the future if you feel up to it, this one was so good!
^^ such a fun game to just play while bored in class and etc, has it's small bugs ofc being new, but such an awesome little game with good and interesting mechanics that I can't wait to see evolve!
